body.name: HAYOFAMY Bookshelf, Bookcase for Small Spaces, 3 Tier White Book Organizer Storage Display Rack for Kids Room, Living Room, Office, Bedroom and Bathroom

features: [Compact Design] Our small bookshelf is the perfect solution for limited spaces, measuring only 25.6”H x 15.7”L x 9.4”W, allowing you to make the most out of your available room in your kids', living room, office, bedroom, or bathroom.

[Multipurpose Storage] As both a bookcase and an end table nightstand, this versatile storage/display rack accommodates not only your storybooks and small toys but also functions as a handy surface for your essentials or decorative items.

[Durable Materials] Made from PVC material, this white bookcase is not only lightweight and easy to assemble, but also waterproof and eco-friendly, ensuring a long-lasting and environmentally responsible choice for your storage needs.

[Efficient Organization] The 3-tier book organizer features a mortise design, providing ample space to keep your books neat and tidy while making them easily accessible for your children, family members, and guests.

[Attractive Appearance] With its stylish white finish, this kids' bookcase will seamlessly blend in with your existing home decor, whether it's for a kids' room or any other area in your home, creating a visually appealing and functional piece of furniture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This small bookshelf is constructed from PVC board, which is a durable, multi-functional storage solution for adults or children's items. It easily accommodates books, magazines, toys, and other small personal effects, effortlessly decluttering and organizing your space. Its versatile design makes it an excellent addition to any room — be it the living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen or office. Ease of assembly is a standout feature, making this unit a convenient choice. Additionally, the smooth surface can be effortlessly cleaned with water, maintaining its fresh, pristine look.

Firm Structure There is a double Ⅱ-shaped design on the side, which is succinct, clean and stable enough at the same time. Top Fence Keep your items safe and secure with the added benefit of a top fence, ensuring no accidental spills or falls occur. Back Beams Experience enhanced stability with the addition of back beams, providing extra support and durability for your items.
SPECIFICATIONS: Overall dimensions 9.4"D x 15.7"W x 25.6"H Color White Material PVC Packing Quantity 1 Special Features lightweight, waterproof, multi-purpose

3 Tier Small Bookshelf 4 Tier Small Bookshelf Small Side Table Side Table with Lower Basket Moveable Bookshelf Side Table with Doors Dimensions 9.4"D x 15.7"W x 25.6"H 9.4"D x 15.7"W x 36.6"H 9.5"D x 15.7"W x 23.6"H 9.8"D x 15.7"W x 23.6"H 6.7"D x 14.2"W x 29"H 9.4"D x 15.7"W x 24"H Material PVC PVC PVC PVC PVC PVC Packing Quantity 1 1 1 1 1 1 Color White White White White White White Easy Installation ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect quality, Decent size, Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this book shelf for my bedroom and I am loving it! It is made of real good quality material. It has a Easy setup manual picture, it fits anywhere even in small place and holds a lot of books. Looks cool, no wobbles. Perfect for cozy spots!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars there was no instructions in the box
reviews.reviewText: it wasn't terribly hard to assemble but when you have 10 or 12 pieces it would be nice to have an instruction sheet~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfectly matched with my new bed!!
reviews.reviewText: I like how modern it looks, I love the color and perfectly matched with my new bed.It was easy to assemble , and at first the wood it feels like foam but when it aired it out the foamy wood became solid and sturdy wood. Just give it some time or overnight to harden the wood. it is just perfect and advanced engineered materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Do not waste your money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this item because it was super cute. And the slats on the side matched my daughter’s headboard in her bedroom. I bought this to put some books on. But the material is super super flimsy. I don’t think II purchased this item because it was super cute. And the slats on the side matched my daughters headboard in her bedroom. I bought this to put some books on. But the material is super super flimsy. I don’t think I could actually put books on it. I put it together hoping I would love it but I didn’t. It’s put together like a puzzle piece. And then you put a bunch of screws in it. I would like to know what the weight limit is on each individual shelf. Because I don’t think that I could actually fill it with books. It’s a Dollar General quality shelf. And for $40 I think it’s way overpriced for the cheap flimsy quality. If it was cheaper I might’ve left it put it together and just see what would happen. But for $40 I took it apart and I’m returning it.Also, there is no finish on the edges. It just looks like a spray paint finish. The sides of it looked terrible because of the puzzle piece design, and the ridiculous amount of screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy small shelf!
reviews.reviewText: I had to change the pieces of this around a few times before I finally got it together properly. And the top pieces still try to come apart on me when I move it anywhere or if I pick it up. But it is handy and works in small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, flimsy, overpriced junk.
reviews.reviewText: I'll keep this brief to save you the time and you can continue shopping elsewhere for a different product. This thing was so flimsy I'm not even sure what the material actually is; reinforced cardboard, some kind of foam maybe..? The puzzle-like pieces 'push' together for assembly and one of them snapped before I could even get the screws in as the final step. (Good luck with the instructions, by the way.) I can't believe this is selling at fifty dollars, it's more like a ten-dollar product you'd find at the big stock stores. Overseas, overpriced junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a table next to my recliner for things like remote controls a small lamp. You know to put your important stuff when you’re watching TV. This is the perfect size. It was also fun to put together. It was like a puzzle and all the pieces were cut perfectly. It fit perfectly under the window also which was what I needed. And for the price you can’t go wrong. It looks way more expensive than what it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super nice little shelf
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Shelf arrived in very amazing quality and not damaged!It was super easy to put together it included the directions and the necessary tools to put together as well! It was just as described in the ad!! Screws included!!The color matches perfectly with the picture as well!! I love it!!!😍 You can fit quite a bit on there as well! 10 out of 10 would recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy lindo y fácil de armar
